name: scifi adventure
description:
SciFi Adventure

The space station is in danger! As a junior technician, it's up to you to help your team repair the station's ventilation system and do it before you run out of air!

The game is a portfolio project. 
Source code

Developers:
  • Frag112: instagram
  • Анастасия Лобова: github

All models/sounds/effects are free and available at Unity Asset Store.
